short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add voice input functionality to ChatGPT, Press Ctrl+Q to open voice input

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Voice GPT is a simple tool that helps you type using your voice in ChatGPT. Just install the extension, give your microphone permission and let it handle the rest.

VoiceGPT can help you write faster using your own voice.
